1.title: Pilot
1.plot: The evil Doctor Cinema is free from his imprisonment, and plots to rule the world with bad movies. His first strike is capturing famed movie reviewer Sid Xander. Now it is up to an aspiring movie reviewer to take over as Anthonix Maximus.

2.title: Electric Boogaloo
2.plot: After breaking into Sid Xander's home, Anthonix Maximus, along with Vincent and Corey, begin to take over. However, Anthonix begins to question if he should be the next internet movie reviewer after reading through Xander's work.

3.title: Bay of Reckoning
3.plot: After Anthonix Maximus releases a review in absence of the captured Sid Xander, the evil Doctor Cinema unleashes his ultimate revenge. He uses one of his diabolical directors to take out the enemy which results in a casualty.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: Tony is an aspiring online movie reviewer who longs to famous just like his idol, Sid Xander, but does not have the means to secure his dream. That is until an evil villain is freed from his years of imprisonment, and vows to continue his plot to plague the world with his mass-produced cheesy films. Doctor Cinema soon captures Sid Xander. Now, Tony, with the help of his friends, must take over as reviewer as Anthonix Maximus.
imdb.title: Anthonix Maximus
plot: ANTHONIX MAXIMUS is a comedy web series about an up and coming movie reviewer forced to review movies, and take on the films that plague our world with mediocrity that threaten all of mankind!!! ...Or something like that.

Tony is an aspiring online movie reviewer who longs to famous just like his idol, Sid Xander, but does not have the means to secure his dream. That is until an evil villain is freed from his years of imprisonment, and vows to continue his plot to plague the world with his mass-produced cheesy films. Doctor Cinema soon captures Sid Xander. Now, Tony, with the help of his friends, must take over as reviewer as _Anthonix Maximus_ (qv).
